    • decreaseLife

      public boolean decreaseLife​(int damage)
      this method is used when a shoot collides the zombie and decrease it's live
      Parameters:
      damage - how many of zombie's life will be decreased
      Returns:
      true is zombie is still alive , false if not(means zombie dies)
